page.title: 13Employment on Coll
page.content: Coll is not a big island there for there is not much employment. Quite alot of the employment is supplied by people on the island who need the help. Alot of people are self employed with jobs like, fishing, farming,homehelps and builders. The healthboard employs 3 people like the Doctor and the nurses. The Herbals employ 4 ladies. Strathclyde Regional Council employ the teacher the school cook, cleaner of Arinagour School. They also employ the road men.There is only one post office. The post man is a private contractor. Caledonian MacBrayne employ 2 people to operate the pier. The guest house and the Hotel employ quite a few. Breachacha Builders employ 3 people. Project Trust also employ 7 people.
